summary: The filming of Nosferatu (1922) is hampered by the fact that its star Max Schreck is taking the role of a vampire far more seriously than seems humanly possible.
cast: John Malkovich|Willem Dafoe|Udo Kier|Cary Elwes|Catherine McCormack|Eddie Izzard|Aden Gillett|Nicholas Elliott|Ronan Vibert|Sophie Langevin|Myriam Muller|Milos Hlavac|Marja-Leena Junker|Derek Kueter|Norman Golightly|Patrick Hastert|Sascha Ley|Marie-Paule von Roesgen|Jean-Claude Croes|Christophe Chrompin|Graham Johnston|Orian Williams|Ingeborga Dapkunaite|Radica Jovicic
title: La sombra del vampiro
